website_summaries.verdict: Records audio clearly, but the omission of file-transfer capability could disappoint some users.
pros: Clear audio recordings with good mic pickup
cons: Cannot transfer audio files from recorder to a computer, as it has no USB port

customer_reviews.title: Very user-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most economical and easy to use voice recorder out there. I purchased these all the time for my young students. I use them to record stories that the students can read back on their own. If a five, six, or seven year old can learn how to use this machine, it must be very user-friendly. The only aspect that could be confusing is that there are four or five folder. But if you stick to the one folder at a time, recordings are simple to make and find for playback.
customer_reviews.author: Allie K.

customer_reviews.title: Sony ICD BX-140 Recorder
customer_reviews.text: Just received my DVR (Digital Voice Recorder) and I am highly impressed. The playback sound quality is amazing, I have Beats by Dre (Wireless) and when I play the recording back it is perfect... I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Goes into deep sleep with no menu to keep in regular sleep mode available for  immediate recording
customer_reviews.text: I use a recorder in my car to make notes while driving, previously happily used model BX 112. Unfortunately this newer model (140) goes to deep sleep mode and is not immediately ready to record. Yes it extends battery life a teeny bit, but no it is not useful for me while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BX 140 CAN NOT SAVE FILES TO COMPUTER
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product reading the reviews that it could save files to a computer. Unfortunately the page does not separate the reviews for the ICD PX333 with this one. I therefore got fooled in believing that this product would have the capability of recording files and transferring them to a computer. The only way to do that is to directly link your recorder to your computer as a recording device, and only supports up to Windows 7, making it incompatible with mine. Amazon should really separate the listings of he 2 products, since there is a vast difference if you cannot transfer files from one, but can from another.
customer_reviews.author: Leisamp

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size. This device has good playback sound and records well in a large room. It was very easy to use right out of the box. I have had it for about a month and use it to record meetings. So far the battery life has been exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent voice recorder works awesome to record EVP’s or daily memo. We use it a lot to record our sessions of the paranormal. Lee Of Southern Paranormal
customer_reviews.author: Southern Paranormal

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Lacks key feature
customer_reviews.text: Product has worked well. Okay sound quality and pretty good playback audio. It was easy to use also. I ended up buying a plug-in microphone and it really boosted sound quality. The product would have received 5-stars but it is lacking a key feature for me.....the ability to download the audio file. While i was able to playback my audio as many times as I wanted, I was not able to store the audio file on a secondary storage device which is an important feature. While I still use this recorder, my preference has been the Sony ICDUX560BLK which has a built-in USB that easily plugs into my laptop for downloading.
customer_reviews.author: MazDad

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a few months ago. The description ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago. The description clearly says "The Sony 4GB MP3 Digital Voice IC Recorder allows you to record voice memos, interviews, presentations and more as MP3 files. It features 4GB of internal storage as well as a built-in microphone for capturing your audio without the need for an external microphone." - MP3 files. However, I am now realizing there is no place to connect to a computer. This is rather misleading and based on when I ordered the time for returns has long passed. Would never have bought if that was the case.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This recorder has very clear sound. Size is ideal to store in your pocket. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylon Williams

customer_reviews.title: User friendly but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I got this mini recorder because I like how easy it is to use. I had an older one which I got as a gift and I loved it but I had to use tape on the battery cover because it didnt stay connected otherwise. So I got this new one thinking that my tape hassle will be gone. It is not. Now I know it’s Sony design. I have to tape the cover on this brand new one so I can use it. I wish they will invest more in finding ways to click that cover so people don’t lose batteries or alternate to using tape.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Dogar

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This One
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst voice recorder I've owned. Sound quality is bad and often unintelligible. Construction is cheap plastic. Controls are counter-intuitive. Worst, it doesn't have any way to plug into a computer and transfer files. Whatever you record is stuck on the recorder. It's 2018. Why would you do that?
customer_reviews.author: Nick Swartsell

customer_reviews.title: One for the road, one for the bed, one to trade files, one to keep in reserve.  A fine, fine device.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing audio recorder I've run across. I've transferred years of journals recorded on cassette tapes, favorite songs, hypnosis programs. I use more than one to regroup recordings and a third one for everyday comments. The small activation light is comforting at night, assuring me it's on. The few controls are easy to locate in the dark and recording is an easy process. I'll probably try to buy one each month so I never run out. Ease moving among multiple files.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Moyers

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: The recorder otself works fine, but it did not come with the instruction booklet everyone talked about in the reviews. That was the reason I bought new. It did have a leaflet describing on/off function and battery insertion, but as to the functions and menu section I have no idea. Really disappointed. I even went on YouTube hoping to get some ideas, but they only had reviews available. I wanted it for it's voice activation feature, but don't know how to use it, so it's pretty much a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use but does not transfer files
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -excellent price -sound quality is great -easy to use Cons: -can’t transfer files to a computer (I knew this ahead of time but this may be a bigger problem for others). Overall, if you’re looking for a record for lectures, or anything else really, this is a good recorder to have. If you’re looking to transfer files, consider another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: It's GREAT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this would do what I need it to do but it is really awesome. I take it to doctor appointments because I have a hard time remembering things. I turn it on when the doctor comes and then when I get home I can type my notes. I also use it all the time by wearing it on a lanyard. If something comes to mind that I need to remember I just push the record button and then I can write down the item later. I wish I'd though of this years ago. Everyone I tell about it loves the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Cats4lorie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ghost Hunting! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this Digital Voice Recorder for ghost hunting actually! I haven’t picked up any paranormal activity yet, but I have used the Device. The recorder picks up great audio when I tested it out by going in the other room and whispered from about 20 feet away and the recorder still picked it up even though I was whispering softly. I bet the range can be even further away then 20 feet! I recommend this device for anyone, and the price is the best!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cannot download the recording. It should be mentioned in product specification.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to turn on
customer_reviews.text: I got it in July and it seemed to be okay but hard to turn on. I had to hold the button down for a long time before it would turn on. Then I taped a song on it and that worked fine. I haven't used it more than three time but when I went to use it this last time it would't turn on for a LONG time and then when it did it just showed the word "hold" and I can't get it to do anything. Pretty high price to pay for a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: lindy

customer_reviews.title: This won a custody battle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend going through a custody battle. Her ex is totally fabricating stuff and putting it in court documents. She recorded conversations in which he admitted to making it up to screw her over. Played those in court, no more custody battle. He gets every other Saturday... supervised. So yeah it works great. Clear and easy to use. Will record forever.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not compatable with iOS
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied with this unit until I tried to transfer files to my computer. I have a MacBook Pro and it would not even show the existence of the recorder. I found that it is incompatable with iOS when I searched through the online owner’s manual. Under s subsection entitled “Compatability” it lists the systems it is compatable with. Only Windows systems are listed. This matter should be prominently stated in the advertisement. I’ve been defrauded.
customer_reviews.author: Juridicus

customer_reviews.title: Can't transfer data
customer_reviews.text: You can't move the data from this voice recorder into the computer. This recorder does not have a port for a USB or any other cord.
customer_reviews.author: RHH

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little recording device. I never leave leave home without it.
customer_reviews.text: I write songs, I get inspired at all times of the day. I have yet to not have it with me when I get that idea for a song or horn riff. This is my second one and it probably won't be my last. Thanks Sony! for making a Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Sax57

customer_reviews.title: junk drawer product
customer_reviews.text: There are no controls for reversing a recording that I could find, nor any ability to save same via micro-usb (sic, that familiar power and data transfer dongle). Spend a little more and get something that has utility because this piece of hardware is nothing more than a waste of money---. I bought it because of the Sony name, and did I take a bath. OOUUCCHH.
customer_reviews.author: GOOBER

customer_reviews.title: Bad Choice
customer_reviews.text: First recorder malfunctioned immediately, the second wouldn't work at all. Stay away from used merchandise! There's a reason why they're returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hauser

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a PDX 333, I did not realize that this one was so different. The interface is much slower, every time you press a button you need to wait one or two seconds for the machine to catch up. It does work! But, compared to the 333 it was surprisingly disappointed. The sound quality is a little bit less than the 333, but you can barely tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lantern Photography

customer_reviews.title: Simplified her life
customer_reviews.text: My brother had me order this for his girlfriend. She just needed a basic recorder for making notations when she didn’t have time or couldn’t write them down. She is thrilled with it. It does not have all the features of the more expensive models, but it has more than she’ll ever use. It has simplified her life.
customer_reviews.author: Kumukula

customer_reviews.title: It Left Me Just The Satisfaction I Was Looking For...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much, it came down to this: It worked for me flawlessly. I simply put it in my top shirt holder, it was most inconspicuous, didn't make a sound, and worked like a charm. It caught every lie I needed and worked in Court beautifully straight from the lying lips of "man of the hour"...to the Judge's ears. I'm happy...the banker? Not so happy.
customer_reviews.author: konichiwa

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. The sound quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm in school for counseling and I've been using this for sessions with my clients at internship so I can go back and review my progress. So far, I really like it. The sound quality is awesome. I was using another voice recorder before this one and I'm glad I selected this after that one wasn't working. My only concern so far is the battery situation. I'm not sure what to do when the special battery it comes with runs out. Otherwise it's been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Digital Voice Recorder
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Digital Voice Recorder has enabled me to take more thorough minutes of the Homeowners' Association meetings. The recordings are clear and no matter what you have the volume on, it records the meetings with clarity. It has saved a great deal of time, energy and has put my mind at ease. Thank you, Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: No. 1 Fan

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: I have had different versions of this record for at least 10 years. I replace them when the buttons wear out. I don’t like the on/off button on this model. It’s a showstopper. I returned the first one because i thought it was broken
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Como

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable sound quality and ultra slim and portable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and combat and picks up sound well. I hid this in my sleeve while going undercover to infultrate the local covenant of satan in my neighborhood. It wasnt noticable and I was able to get all the evidence I needed, when I played the audio file backwards I can clearly hear Lucifer telling me to make chocolate chip cookies. I am not sure what will happen with the cookies, hopefully the covenant just eats them and does not use them with malicious intent.
customer_reviews.author: George attwal

customer_reviews.title: Great recorder
customer_reviews.text: As a very busy professional substance abuse counselor (and writing a book), this ICD-BX140 voice recorder is a "life saver." Its operation is easy to master, its quality of sound is second to none (I have been through many other unacceptable unreliable brands), and compatibility to many voice-to-text programs is noteworthy. The data storage capacity is remarkable and more than met my expectation and requirement. I absolutely endorse this recorder. GM
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Useless
customer_reviews.text: A recorder that is unable to transfer files to a computer for editing or sending is completely useless in this day and age. Not a good option if you have any need to transcribe dictation or have any use other than to hear your own voice played back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Railsback

customer_reviews.title: Nice recorder,  But....
customer_reviews.text: Nice recorder, but it came with NO DIRECTIONS. I had to go on line and download the necessary instructions. There are dozens of pages, so I had to only download what I immediately needed. I'm surprised at Sony. Do they sell their TV's also with no user manuals?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Records your voice way better than not having a voice recorder.
customer_reviews.text: For the price its not bad. To be honest it could use a simpler user interface but I got a good deal on it so I really cant complain to much. Recording is easy and play back sounds good. Switching between your recordings was a little more of a hassle than I would have liked but overall, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Foster

customer_reviews.title: Just Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to hear playback clearly. Sounds echoey or something. If I put my hand over the speaker it is easier to hear. Just OK. Not Terrible. But I’m a professional reporter so my standards are quite high. May he suitable for other needs.
customer_reviews.author: Annika

customer_reviews.title: This is a gift.
customer_reviews.text: The Birthday person has not tried it out yet but was very happy with the gift. He said the directions are very simple and will do just what he needs it for. To record his music ideas down when one pops into his mind.
customer_reviews.author: Music Wife

customer_reviews.title: Volume loud enough w/o external speaker
customer_reviews.text: LIKES: I like its compactness. It is so easy to use. This is the 1st time that I've seen a digital recorder with a fast forward & a rewind control. I'm amazed at the excellent clarity of the playback & volume [no external speaker!].
customer_reviews.author: R.C. James

customer_reviews.title: free of useless never used functions
customer_reviews.text: Voice recorder arrived one week earlier then expected. It arrived perfectly packaged. For decades I have serviced reel to reel tape recorders.. all qualities of cassette decks including those in the music industry. For many years I corresponded with family members with cassette tapes. My daughter's music teacher lost my pocket voice recorder so I needed a replacement. So I purchased the Sony ICD-BX140 4GB Voice Recorder. It is top notch quqaity, gimmick free, free of useless never used functions, anybody can understand and use the recorder within a few minutes. The batteries last long enough. This voice recorder is exactly what I wanted and operates exactly as i wanted.. Pricewise amazing. Denny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beep or no beep?
customer_reviews.text: I recommend reading the instructions regarding muting the beep that sounds every time a button is pushed. Until it is muted, the unit would not be useful in meetings or in clandestine circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Ea2dy design to work.
customer_reviews.text: This device is used by a blind woman. Very easy for her to figure out on her own. Keys are excellent for visual impairment. I had bought an earlier model years before and repurchased a newer model when it no longer wirked.
customer_reviews.author: Jan-Lex

customer_reviews.title: auto powers off and this can't be changed
customer_reviews.text: typical features. critical flaw: auto power off and this is NOT configurable. other than that, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Knight

customer_reviews.title: Inaudible Recordings.... Junk
customer_reviews.text: Play back is not audible. Item is a piece of garbage. I thought it was the echo in the room I was using it in. I've tried it since in a different environment, it's so scratchy you can't hear what was recorded. Guess it's also unfortunate that my willingness to give it another try in a different environment means my window to return it is also closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G Arbeen

customer_reviews.title: no usb to transfer or share recordings
customer_reviews.text: The immediate product description does not mention absence of a usb port. Nowadays one would assume that any such device would come with a micro or mini usb port, and sure enough a slightly more expensive model does have it. Even the old recorders allowed to sharing of cassettes. This product is a complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: High quality and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: High quality recorder. I use it everyday to record important topics for my work. My daughter also has the same recorder to record her music and reading assignments. The recorders are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use handheld recorder
customer_reviews.text: This little recorder is perfect for my needs and exactly what I was looking for: an easy to use quick start recorder that I can turn on without looking at it. I use it to quick record ideas and it's doing the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with dead batteries, but new ones brought it back to life!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time at a lecture yesterday and it performed great. As other reviewers said, it does not come with an instruction manual, which I find very odd. However, it is pretty intuitive to use and I have mastered the basics by just playing around with it. I will have to seek out the manual online for more advanced usage. The biggest disappointment so far is that it arrived with batteries included, but they were dead! Glad I had some AAA on hand and got it going!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Payne

customer_reviews.title: A great, handy little recoarder
customer_reviews.text: I got this to record meetings so I could go back and review details, I just lay it on the table and it works great in any direction. Also carry it in my pocket to make little reminder notes to myself, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Wolf

customer_reviews.title: After we figured out how to operate it works great. Easy to turn on quickly and record
customer_reviews.text: Had a little difficulty figuring out how to operate, instructions not real clear. Book was in too many different languages, not enough room for clear instructions. After we figured out how to operate it works great. Easy to turn on quickly and record.
customer_reviews.author: John Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Ok Recorder But.....No USB jack
customer_reviews.text: Good Recorder Seems to work fine but no USB jack to plug into a computer. My fault for not making double sure it had one but other than that a good recorder.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Nicholson III

customer_reviews.title: Battery eater
customer_reviews.text: Eats prodigious quantities of AAA batteries. I use it in the car for note-taking, and it's constantly in standby mode. I'm going to look for one that is rechargeable so I can plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I needed it for. Not so good for music sound quality (I used it to record scales for playback and follow along) but good enough .
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent recorder
customer_reviews.text: i use this recorder to record interviews for stories i write. i just turn it on, lay it down, and start the interview. When i get it home I can easily transfer the recording to my computer where I save it using a phone jack and then listening to it while i type it into MSWord. very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Andreazzi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the sound and ease of use
customer_reviews.author: The Paranormal MD

customer_reviews.title: Not any better than a free cell phone recorder app
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to be able to digitally transfer files from this recorder to my computer hard drive. This is not possible. The only way to transfer is to use an adapter and copy to hard drive in real time, which is highly time consuming. If you have a cell phone recording app, there is no reason to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEADED BEAT RECORDER
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to attend a conference...I entered the brand new Sony batteries that came with it. Recorder worked for 5 minutes and went DEAD...NOT WORKING RIGHT AT THE BEGINNING INTRODUCTION OF MY CONFERENCE...you know I was PIST OFF.....Returning this product. It feels weak...like a toddler cell phone toy. :( I have to laugh because I am was to upset...
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and does what it’s supposed to do. I’m in nursing school and I record lectures for hours at a time and it holds for hours. It also picks up great sound. Only thing I dislike is I have to constantly put in new batteries because they always go dead. Other than that, it works good!! I have 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great simple design.
customer_reviews.text: Great simple design that works. Does have (VOR) Voice operated recording which records only when there is sound and pauses when there is no sound.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Download a voice recorder app instead!
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way to upload to the computer. Maybe if it was 1990, it would be cool.. but for the price, it should be capable of allowing the recordings to be uploaded to a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy, Vitorio, Jonathan, & Aiden

customer_reviews.title: These recorders do not have the ability do upload to ...
customer_reviews.text: These recorders do not have the ability do upload to a pc. YOu have to use line in and play through the tracks you want to transfer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to work right. Couldn't record more than one message, or it would erase the first. And then later couldn't get it to work at all. I ended up throwing it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Crabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good recorder
customer_reviews.text: Was able to record an entire 45 minute phone conversation and have it transcribed. Kinda saved my life. It's a good little recorder. Easy to use. All the buttons are clealy marked, record, stop, play. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: S. GarrettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality....Awful
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was awful compared to another brand I have. Also I am not sure if it records in stereo, it doesn't seem so. The build quality is solid but the item seems very outdated to me.
customer_reviews.author: andrea medford

customer_reviews.title: Nice recorder....
customer_reviews.text: On time as advertised. The on/off switch is a pain in the ass. Still haven't quite figured out how to turn it off and on reliably. Shipping and all that was GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Hank C.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for quick notes and short taped visualizations. Worked perfect for my needs. Light weight. Small.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: very good recorder. Doesnt filter noise very well but catches ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, very good recorder. Doesnt filter noise very well but catches everything, menu interface is a little difficult to figure out and unfortunately it cant transfer recordings to the computer. But i am happy with the purchase and it comes with a good warranty in case something goes awry. Thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke after approximately two hours of recording. Had to buy another brand to complete task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: DelMundo

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: The recording quality itself isn't too bad, considering the price. However, mine came with no instructions so I've had to figure out the functions on my own, which has been very frustrating. Also there are function buttons on each side and it's very easy to accidentally hit one or another just by handling the case. I don't think I'd buy another one but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Annoix

customer_reviews.title: It wasted my time
customer_reviews.text: meeting starts, and I'm still looking around if its on and recording. Not user friendly nor click and record
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality, you can’t transfer Files digitally
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it’s very old school, no internal memory, the sound over compressed and bad
customer_reviews.author: George J Brass

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: Put new batteries in it twice. Still can’t get it to turn in. I’m guessing it’s a cheap knockoff but looks like the real deal. You’re better of buying one at one of the big box stores - then you can return or exchange it - if you need to .
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Save Files to A Computer
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of having a recorder that can't transfer files to a computer? I was very disappointed in this recorder. It looks very similar to another Sony recorder that I have purchased that does have the ability to transfer files, so I got fooled... That feature (or lack thereof) should be more prominent on the feature list.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and in great condition. While it's going to take some getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition. While it's going to take some getting used to (switching from previous device to this one) it won't be painful to do. Also glad that it doesn't have the feature where you have to transfer files to a computer. With computers being hacked into daily, who needs that hassle?
customer_reviews.author: pau

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You get your money's worth for the price. Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: I used this with my students at school.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my students at school...a little difficult to get it going, but ok once I understood it.
customer_reviews.author: M.C. Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for students and professionals
customer_reviews.text: Simply love it. Easy to setup, great for lectures and personal note reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat little recorder
customer_reviews.text: Has huge record capacity-simple to operate. Audio on phones is super; like the compact size
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: like new condition and works great! Bought 2 at this price. One for me, as a songwriter, and one for my little granddaughter who loves to sing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Nice little recorder
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it, it's clear, loud enough for his deaf ears and simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a photographer instead of notes and notebooks so much easier to carry this recorder around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was wanting and needed. Records great an I didn’t need a degree to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: K Ganoe

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: So far good, however screen a little hard for elderly to read
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, just bummed out that it doesn't have an Micro SD card slot to transfer recordings to the pc (my mistake). Otherwise it sounds great! It feels cheap, but the important components (mic, mostly) are of good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great recorder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 30 of these for a workshop. Recorded individual table conversations in a large room. Sound quality was excellent- clear without too much background noise. Easy to use. Price is very good. Came complete with battery- ready to roll. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Even has a battery gauge. Easy to use. Perfect for taking notes.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy Doody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for counseling sessions to transcribe. No problems. Background noise is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Just__Me

customer_reviews.title: Clear recordings
customer_reviews.text: Great product, only bad thing is it has no way to download the recordings on to another device (ie a laptop) otherwise works great and recordings are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: F.V

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Goes through batteries like nothing else. Even when it's off. You can't transfer files or anything either. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Saleh Aliyari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great name brand digital voice recorder at a fine price.Great shipping
customer_reviews.author: antonio aponte

customer_reviews.title: Works well, clear recordings, plenty of recording time
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Good clarity on recordings. Plenty of room for recordings. No dealing with tapes & associated problems. Especially like the Add-On feature where you can add additional recording to an existing message.
customer_reviews.author: Telephone Jack

customer_reviews.title: Much better voice quality
customer_reviews.text: Much better voice quality, speaker quality, than earlier versions and this one can be cut off to save the battery. Earlier versions cannot. Uses AAA batteries and that's good too.
customer_reviews.author: William Tate

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any problems recording, even outdoors. Also keeps time well, so time stamps are accurate. Pretty easy to use, but menus are sometimes confusing to get to what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Litzelman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't plug into your computer
customer_reviews.text: Pay the extra to get one that has a usb port, or memory card. This has neither.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Still have it, I use it for recording my radio traffic voice so that I dont sound like an indoors. It is kinda bulky to wear on your person though.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: NO OUTPUT TO ANYTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why the heck would anyone make a recorder like this in this day and age???? I'm returning it. Don't buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiateri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent recorder simplified use.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding recording power and simple to use which many recorders are not.
customer_reviews.author: ron northrup

customer_reviews.title: works well, but could be simplilfied
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, but the functions are a bit complex. I would like to see a simplified version. Still good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flutterbuys

customer_reviews.title: Price right and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for a stroke victim to practice language skills. Easy to use, nice volume and has the ability for multiple recordings. Big PLAY BUTTON, which is great in this scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H. Dipane

customer_reviews.title: not as powerful as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: While I could clearly hear people who had strong voices on it, a soft voice completely disappeared on this recorder.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will be happy
customer_reviews.text: Love this recorder! I use it in history class so I can review the info the professor has.. it is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: LizLos

product_meta.title: Sony ICD-BX140 4GB Digital Voice Recorder
product_meta.description: Style:140| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingEasy to use, the iced-bx140 delivers. Combining simplicity and capability the iced-bx140 offers: extra-long recording time, add and overwrite functions for corrections and additions to your recordings, and digital pitch control for powerful playback and recording capability in the palm of your hand. Input Output Terminals: Headphone Jack, Microphone In
feature_bullets: Built-in 4 GB flash memory. Automatic record level settings
Up to 4,175 Hours of maximum recording time. Low Cut Filter for reduced wind effect
Mono microphone for 75 Hz–15 kHz audio response
Features built in monaural microphone. Battery life for recording mp3 128 kbps is 28 hours. Battery life for recording mp3 192 kbps is 26 hours
Voice Activated Recording for hands-free recording. Noise Cut mode helps provide clear speech playback
In the box: IC Recorder, LR03 (size AAA) alkaline batteries (2), Quick Start Guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,229 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
